summary: ant jscomp does not pass outputEncoding to compiler options

comments.content:
The output encoding specified in the ant file is not passed to the compiler.  The means the compiler will always output the default ascii (or match the input) no matter what output encoding is passed.  May result on odd behaviors depending on the settings passed. 

Attached patch to fix.

Sorry for the delay. Can you sign the CLA?
https://code.google.com/p/closure-compiler/source/browse/CONTRIBUTORS
Did so already via online form.  Should I do it again?
This issue was closed by revision a975532c915c.
